level.heading: Meetings; regular and special--Units of membership.
level.text: The articles or bylaws may provide for the holding of meetings by units of the membership and may provide for a method of transmitting the votes there cast to the central meeting, or for a method of representation by the election of delegates to the central meeting, or for a combination of both of these methods.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
